price: 109. Ezali na tembe te, ya soló, bango o mokolo ya suka bakozala bazangi.
arabic: لَا جَرَمَ أَنَّهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: lā jarama annahum fī al-ākhirati humu al-khāsirūna
